#include <fat.h>


Data Fields

U32 u32_cluster
 For FAT32, the root directory is a cluster list.

 Offset between the beginning of FAT and the beginning of root dir (unit 512B).
   U16   u16_size

 For FAT 12 & 16, it is a segment (no cluster list).
